Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Short Description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

Title: The Godfather
Short Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: 12 Angry Men
Short Description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Title: The Dark Knight
Short Description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

Title: Schindler's List
Short Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Short Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: The Godfather Part II
Short Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Short Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Short Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: I'm Still Here
Short Description: A mother is forced to reinvent herself when her family's life is shattered by an act of arbitrary violence during the tightening grip of a military dictatorship in Brazil, 1971.

Title: Inception
Short Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: Fight Club
Short Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Title: Forrest Gump
Short Description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Short Description: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Short Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
Directors: Ram Mohan, Yûgô Sakô, Koichi Saski

Title: Interstellar
Short Description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Title: GoodFellas
Short Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Title: The Matrix
Short Description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Short Description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Short Description: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins training with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

Title: Shoah
Short Description: Claude Lanzmann's epic documentary recounts the story of the Holocaust through interviews with witnesses - perpetrators as well as survivors.
Directors: Ram Mohan, Yûgô Sakô, Koichi Saski

Title: Stop Making Sense
Short Description: A live performance of the band Talking Heads shot over the course of three nights at Hollywood's Pantages Theater in December of 1983 and featuring their most memorable songs.

Title: Seven
Short Description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Short Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: The Green Mile
Short Description: A death row guard learns that a gentle giant in his charge possesses a mysterious gift.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Short Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: City of God
Short Description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Short Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Short Description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: Spirited Away
Short Description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: Life Is Beautiful
Short Description: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Title: It's a Wonderful Life
Short Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Title: Seven Samurai
Short Description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

Title: Harakiri
Short Description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Title: Gladiator
Short Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: Dune: Part Two
Short Description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future.

Title: Parasite
Short Description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Title: The Departed
Short Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: The Prestige
Short Description: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

Title: Django Unchained
Short Description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Title: Alien
Short Description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

Title: Whiplash
Short Description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Title: The Usual Suspects
Short Description: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

Title: Back to the Future
Short Description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Title: Leon
Short Description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Title: The Pianist
Short Description: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

Title: The Lion King
Short Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Short Description: Traveling across the multiverse, Miles Morales meets a new team of Spider-People, made up of heroes from different dimensions. But when the heroes clash over how to deal with a new threat, Miles finds himself at a crossroads.

Title: Once Upon a Time in the West
Short Description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: Grave of the Fireflies
Short Description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Title: Casablanca
Short Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Psycho
Short Description: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

Title: Untouchable
Short Description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Title: Rear Window
Short Description: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

Title: Cinema Paradiso
Short Description: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.
Directors: Ram Mohan, Yûgô Sakô, Koichi Saski

Title: Dear Zachary: A Letter to a Son About His Father
Short Description: A filmmaker decides to memorialize a murdered friend when his friend's ex-girlfriend announces she is expecting his son.

Title: Modern Times
Short Description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Title: City Lights
Short Description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Title: 20 Days in Mariupol
Short Description: As the Russian invasion begins, a team of Ukrainian journalists trapped in the besieged city of Mariupol struggle to continue their work documenting the war's atrocities.

Title: Senna
Short Description: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.

Title: The Best of Youth
Short Description: An Italian epic that follows the lives of two brothers from the 1960s to the 2000s.

Title: For Sama
Short Description: FOR SAMA is both an intimate and epic journey into the female experience of war.

Title: Home
Short Description: With aerial footage from fifty-four countries, 'Home' is a depiction of how Earth's problems are all interlinked.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Short Description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Title: Avengers: Endgame
Short Description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Short Description: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

Title: Memento
Short Description: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Short Description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

Title: The Shining
Short Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Short Description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Title: Aliens
Short Description: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Title: Apocalypse Now
Short Description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: Das Boot
Short Description: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Short Description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Amadeus
Short Description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Title: Your Name.
Short Description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

Title: The Lives of Others
Short Description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Title: 3 Idiots
Short Description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Title: WALL·E
Short Description: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

Title: Coco
Short Description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Title: Capernaum
Short Description: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

Title: Sunset Blvd.
Short Description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Title: Witness for the Prosecution
Short Description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Title: Paths of Glory
Short Description: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

Title: High and Low
Short Description: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

Title: Samsara
Short Description: Filmed over nearly five years in twenty-five countries on five continents, and shot on seventy-millimetre film, Samsara transports us to the varied worlds of sacred grounds, disaster zones, industrial complexes, and natural wonders.

Title: The Salt of the Earth
Short Description: The life and work of photographer Sebastião Salgado, who has spent forty years documenting societies in hidden corners of the world.

Title: The Cove
Short Description: Using state-of-the-art equipment, a group of activists, led by renowned dolphin trainer Ric O'Barry, infiltrate a cove near Taijii, Japan to expose both a shocking instance of animal abuse and a serious threat to human health.

Title: Black Friday
Short Description: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

Title: Oppenheimer
Short Description: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bombs that brought an end to World War II.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
Short Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Title: Heat
Short Description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Short Description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

Title: The Sting
Short Description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: American Beauty
Short Description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Title: Incendies
Short Description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Title: Scarface
Short Description: In the 1980s, a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Miami, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

Title: Good Will Hunting
Short Description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: Oldboy
Short Description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

Title: Braveheart
Short Description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: Judgment at Nuremberg
Short Description: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their actions.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Short Description: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

Title: Joker
Short Description: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.
Directors: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson

Title: The Hunt
Short Description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

Title: Reservoir Dogs
Short Description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Short Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Title: Toy Story
Short Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Title: Singin' in the Rain
Short Description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

Title: Hamilton
Short Description: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Short Description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Title: Amélie
Short Description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, young waitress Amelie decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey during which she finds true love.

Title: Lawrence of Arabia
Short Description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Short Description: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to global nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Title: Up
Short Description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Title: Princess Mononoke
Short Description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Title: Toy Story 3
Short Description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Title: Metropolis
Short Description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Title: Vertigo
Short Description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

Title: Citizen Kane
Short Description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Title: The Apartment
Short Description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Short Description: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

Title: Double Indemnity
Short Description: An insurance representative is seduced by a dissatisfied housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

Title: North by Northwest
Short Description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

Title: A Separation
Short Description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Title: Ikiru
Short Description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Title: The Rescue
Short Description: A chronicle of the enthralling, against-all-odds story that transfixed the world in 2018: the daring rescue of twelve boys and their coach from deep inside a flooded cave in Northern Thailand.

Title: Man with a Movie Camera
Short Description: A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.

Title: The Cranes Are Flying
Short Description: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

Title: Children of Paradise
Short Description: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan in 1830s Paris and the four men who love her.

Title: Hoop Dreams
Short Description: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

Title: Red Beard
Short Description: In 19th-century Japan, a rough-tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

Title: The Look of Silence
Short Description: A family that survived the genocide in Indonesia confronts the men who killed one of their brothers.

Title: Sansho the Bailiff
Short Description: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.

Title: Samurai Rebellion
Short Description: The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.

Title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
Short Description: An exploration of the life, lessons, and legacy of iconic children's television host Fred Rogers.

Title: Winter on Fire: Ukraine's Fight for Freedom
Short Description: A documentary on the unrest in Ukraine during 2013 and 2014, as student demonstrations supporting European integration grew into a violent revolution calling for the resignation of President Viktor F. Yanukovich.

Title: The Wild Robot
Short Description: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Short Description: The story involves Maverick confronting his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.

Title: Jurassic Park
Short Description: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Short Description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Title: Prisoners
Short Description: Keller Dover is facing every parent's worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is an RV that had been parked on their street.

Title: Green Book
Short Description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

Title: Taxi Driver
Short Description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Short Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Short Description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Short Description: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Title: Shutter Island
Short Description: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

Title: Casino
Short Description: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

Title: The Truman Show
Short Description: An insurance salesman begins to suspect that his whole life is actually some sort of reality TV show.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

Title: Batman Begins
Short Description: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

Title: Snatch
Short Description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Title: There Will Be Blood
Short Description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Title: The Elephant Man
Short Description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
Short Description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

Title: The Thing
Short Description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Title: The Sixth Sense
Short Description: After being shot by a resentful former patient whom he failed to help, a Philadelphia child psychologist seeks redemption by treating a young boy with a disturbing secret.

Title: All About Eve
Short Description: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

Title: A Beautiful Mind
Short Description: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

Title: Some Like It Hot
Short Description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Title: Unforgiven
Short Description: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

Title: Full Metal Jacket
Short Description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Title: Gone with the Wind
Short Description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Title: L.A. Confidential
Short Description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: Pan's Labyrinth
Short Description: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Short Description: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Title: Die Hard
Short Description: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Short Description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Title: Downfall
Short Description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

Title: Finding Nemo
Short Description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Title: The Father
Short Description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

Title: The Secret in Their Eyes

Short Description: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

Title: Harold and Maude
Short Description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

Title: Tampopo
Short Description: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

Title: The Hustler
Short Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.
Directors: Sam Dunn, Scot McFadyen, Jessica Joy Wise

Title: Mirror
Short Description: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

Title: The Big Sleep
Short Description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail--and what might be love.

Title: Talk to Her
Short Description: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

Title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
Short Description: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Title: High Noon
Short Description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Title: Patton
Short Description: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

Title: Touch of Evil
Short Description: A Mexican official and his American wife are targeted in a Texas border town by the crime family he's trying to put behind bars for drug trafficking, as his concern grows over the tactics of the local detective whose cooperation he needs.

Title: Short Term 12
Short Description: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

Title: The Killing
Short Description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Title: The Conformist
Short Description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

Title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
Short Description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

Title: Mildred Pierce
Short Description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

Title: Once Were Warriors
Short Description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

Title: My Name Is Khan
Short Description: Rizwan Khan is a Muslim immigrant to the US with Asperger's syndrome. After his family falls apart in the aftermath of 9/11, he begins an epic quest across the country to speak to the President of the United States and clear his name.

Title: In Cold Blood
Short Description: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

Title: 3-Iron
Short Description: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

Title: A Taxi Driver
Short Description: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

Title: Nostalgia
Short Description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Short Description: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

Title: Head-On
Short Description: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

Title: Stalag 17
Short Description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Title: Nine Queens
Short Description: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

Title: Kagemusha
Short Description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

Title: Battleship Potemkin
Short Description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

Title: Dont Look Back
Short Description: Documentary covering Bob Dylan's 1965 tour of England, which includes appearances by Joan Baez and Donovan.

Title: The Thin Man
Short Description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

Title: Sullivan's Travels
Short Description: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

Title: The Alpinist
Short Description: Marc-André Leclerc climbs alone, far from the limelight. The free-spirited 23-year-old makes some of the boldest solo ascents in history. With no cameras and no margin for error, Leclerc's approach is the essence of solo adventure.

Title: Touching the Void
Short Description: The true story of two climbers and their perilous journey up the west face of Siula Grande in the Peruvian Andes in 1985.

Title: Flee
Short Description: A man look back over his life as he grapples with a painful secret he has keep hidden for 20 years, one that threatens to derail the life he has built for himself and his soon to be husband.

Title: Lift to the Scaffold
Short Description: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

Title: Miracle on 34th Street
Short Description: After a divorced New York mother hires a nice old man to play Santa Claus at Macy's, she is startled by his claim to be the genuine article. When his sanity is questioned, a lawyer defends him in court by arguing that he's not mistaken.

Title: Now, Voyager
Short Description: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

Title: The Greatest Night in Pop
Short Description: On January 28th 1985, dozens of the era's most popular musicians gathered in Los Angeles to record a charity single for African famine relief. Setting egos aside, they collaborated on a song that would make history.

Title: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
Short Description: A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.
Directors: John Lasseter, Ash Brannon, Lee Unkrich

Title: The Red Circle
Short Description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: No Man's Land
Short Description: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

Title: La Belle et la Bête
Short Description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

Title: About Elly
Short Description: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

Title: The Return
Short Description: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

Title: Opening Night
Short Description: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

Title: Icarus
Short Description: When Bryan sets out to uncover the truth about doping in sports, a chance meeting with a Russian scientist transforms his story from a personal experiment into a geopolitical thriller.

Title: My Man Godfrey
Short Description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

Title: Gully Boy
Short Description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

Title: The Stoning of Soraya M.
Short Description: A story told by Zahra to a French journalist of her niece Soraya Manutchehri, a 35-year-old married woman, who received capital punishment and stoned to death because of false accusations in the remote village of Kuhpayeh, Iran, in 1986.

Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Short Description: Following the style of some of the world's most prolific street artists, an amateur filmmaker makes a foray into the art world.

Title: Eternity and a Day
Short Description: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

Title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
Short Description: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

Title: Still Walking
Short Description: A family gathers together for a commemorative ritual whose nature only gradually becomes clear.

Title: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance
Short Description: In the face of increasingly bizarre and powerful Angel attacks, Shinji Ikari and his partner Rei Ayanami are assisted by two new pilots: the fiery Asuka Langley Shikinami and the mysterious Mari Illustrious Makinami.

Title: Through a Glass Darkly
Short Description: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

Title: The Thin Blue Line
Short Description: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

Title: The Rules of the Game
Short Description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Title: I Am Not Your Negro
Short Description: Writer James Baldwin tells the story of race in modern America with his unfinished novel, Remember This House.

Title: The Way He Looks
Short Description: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.

Title: The Roaring Twenties
Short Description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

Title: When We Were Kings
Short Description: Boxing documentary on the 1974 world heavyweight championship bout between defending champion, George Foreman, and the underdog challenger, Muhammad Ali.
Directors: Merian C. Cooper, Ernest B. Schoedsack

Title: Deliver Us from Evil
Short Description: Documentary about Father Oliver O'Grady, a Catholic priest who was relocated to various parishes around the United States during the 1970s in an attempt by the Catholic Church to cover up his rape of dozens of children.

Title: Salaam Bombay!
Short Description: Young Krishna struggles to survive among the drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes in the back alleys and gutters of India.

Title: West of Memphis
Short Description: An examination of a failure of justice in the case against the West Memphis Three.

Title: Marley
Short Description: A documentary on the life, music, and legacy of Bob Marley.

Title: Avaze gonjeshk-ha
Short Description: An ostrich-rancher, Karim, embarks on a journey to Tehran, a bustling city, to replace his daughter's hearing aid, a pivotal moment in his family's struggle for independence and cultural exchange.

Title: The Devil and Daniel Johnston
Short Description: Daniel Johnston, manic-depressive genius singer/songwriter/artist is revealed in this portrait of madness, creativity and love.

Title: Anvil: The Story of Anvil
Short Description: Since 1978, Anvil has become one of heavy metal's most influential yet commercially unsuccessful acts. In 2006, after a fledging European tour Anvil sets out to record their thirteenth album and continue to follow their dreams.

Title: Earth
Short Description: Feature-length version of the documentary TV series Planet Earth (2006), following the migration paths of four animal families.

Title: Winged Migration
Short Description: Documentary on the migratory patterns of birds, shot over the course of three years on all seven continents.

Title: Microcosmos : le peuple de l'herbe
Short Description: A documentary on insect life in meadows and ponds.

Title: Poor Things
Short Description: An account of the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

Title: The Batman
Short Description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, the Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Short Description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: The Gentlemen
Short Description: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

Title: The Notebook
Short Description: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.

Title: Pride & Prejudice
Short Description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Title: Apocalypto
Short Description: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

Title: Call Me by Your Name
Short Description: It's the summer of 1983, and 17-year-old Elio is spending the days with his family at their villa in Lombardy, Italy. He soon meets Oliver, who's working as an intern for Elio's father. They discover the heady beauty of awakening desire.

Title: Tombstone
Short Description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Short Description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Memoir of a Snail
Short Description: A bittersweet memoir of a melancholic woman called Grace Pudel - a hoarder of snails, romance novels, and guinea pigs.

Title: Little Women
Short Description: 19th century Massachusetts. While the March sisters - Jo, Meg, Amy, and Beth - enter the threshold of womanhood, they go through many ups and downs in life and endeavor to make important decisions that can affect their future.

Title: The Breakfast Club
Short Description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Title: Hidden Figures
Short Description: Three female African-American mathematicians play a pivotal role in astronaut John Glenn's launch into orbit while dealing with racial and gender discrimination.

Title: About Time
Short Description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Title: Past Lives
Short Description: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrested apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Twenty years later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

Title: Get Out
Short Description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

Title: The Social Network
Short Description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Short Description: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Title: The Big Short
Short Description: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Title: Atonement
Short Description: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

Title: The Day of the Jackal
Short Description: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Short Description: A brash, cocky high school senior, tired of skipping school to spend a boring day at home, is determined to enjoy an epic day roaring around his favorite Chicago sites, enlisting his best friend and girlfriend to join him on the adventure.

Title: The Irishman
Short Description: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

Title: Drive
Short Description: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver.

Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Short Description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

Title: Rogue One
Short Description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

Title: A Bronx Tale
Short Description: An intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

Title: The Untouchables
Short Description: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

Title: Predator
Short Description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

Title: Dunkirk
Short Description: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Title: Ghostbusters
Short Description: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

Title: Paddington 2
Short Description: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

Title: Awakenings
Short Description: Dr. Sayer is a pioneering neurologist who wants to take a risk and give his patients who suffer from encephalitis a drug used for Parkinson's Disease. He tries it out on one man who miraculously wakes from his perpetual catatonic state.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Short Description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by hacker Lisbeth Salander.

Title: Society of the Snow
Short Description: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes. The few passengers who survive the crash find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

Title: The Fall
Short Description: In 1920s Los Angeles, a bedridden patient in a hospital captivates a young girl with a fantastic tale of heroes, myths, and villains on a desert island.

Title: Remember the Titans
Short Description: In 1971, Virginia high-school football was everything to the people of Alexandria, but when the school board was forced to integrate an all-Black school with an all-white one, the foundation of football's tradition was put to the test.

Title: Manchester by the Sea
Short Description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Short Description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Title: I Saw the Devil
Short Description: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

Title: Nightcrawler
Short Description: A petty thief desperate for work muscles into the world of crime journalism and becomes the star of his own story as he blurs the line between observer and participant.

Title: Captain Fantastic
Short Description: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

Title: The Bourne Identity
Short Description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Title: Misery
Short Description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Short Description: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Short Description: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

Title: Little Miss Sunshine
Short Description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
Short Description: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

Title: Training Day
Short Description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Short Description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
Short Description: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain, their homeland, from the dragon Smaug.

Title: Cast Away
Short Description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Title: Hot Fuzz
Short Description: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

Title: Walk the Line
Short Description: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

Title: The Sandlot Kids
Short Description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

Title: The Last Samurai
Short Description: In 19th century Japan, Nathan Algren, a US army captain, is hired by the Japanese emperor to train his army in the modern warfare techniques. Captain Algren finds himself trapped in a struggle between two eras and two worlds.

Title: Skyfall
Short Description: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

Title: Mary Poppins
Short Description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

Title: RRR
Short Description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

Title: Big Hero 6
Short Description: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Title: Back to the Future Part II
Short Description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

Title: Close
Short Description: The intense friendship between two thirteen-year old boys Leo and Remi suddenly gets disrupted. Struggling to understand what has happened, Léo approaches Sophie, Rémi's mother. "Close" is a film about friendship and responsibility.

Title: The Fugitive
Short Description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

Title: Coraline
Short Description: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.

Title: Serenity
Short Description: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

Title: Monster
Short Description: A mother demands answers from her son's teacher when her son begins acting strangely.

Title: American Gangster
Short Description: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Title: Mississippi Burning
Short Description: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

Title: Midnight Cowboy
Short Description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Title: Boyz n the Hood
Short Description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

Title: Brazil
Short Description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Title: Moonrise Kingdom
Short Description: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
Short Description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

Title: Moon
Short Description: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

Title: Straight Outta Compton
Short Description: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes hip-hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

Title: Let the Right One In
Short Description: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Title: Cabaret
Short Description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

Title: The Fighter
Short Description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

Title: The Insider
Short Description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

Title: Look Back
Short Description: The overly confident Fujino and the shut-in Kyomoto couldn't be more different, but a love of drawing manga brings these two small-town girls together.

Title: Captain Phillips
Short Description: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

Title: Kiki's Delivery Service
Short Description: Along with her black cat Jiji, Kiki settles in a seaside town and starts a high-flying delivery service. Here begins her magical encounter with independence and responsibility, making lifelong friends and finding her place in the world.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Short Description: Influential industrialist Vanger's niece Harriet disappeared under mysterious circumstances 40 years ago. As a last attempt at solving the case, he hires investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.
Directors: Jacques Perrin, Jacques Cluzaud, Michel Debats

Title: Hud
Short Description: Honest, hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant, egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

Title: Isle of Dogs
Short Description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Short Description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

Title: The World's Fastest Indian
Short Description: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

Title: The Searchers
Short Description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

Title: Kramer vs. Kramer
Short Description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Title: Glory
Short Description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

Title: The Asphalt Jungle
Short Description: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

Title: Dawn of the Dead
Short Description: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: A Prophet
Short Description: A delinquent Muslim man struggles to get by in prison until he is taken under the wing of a powerful mob boss. But his gradual rise through the mob's ranks brings him in conflict with his mentor.

Title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
Short Description: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

Title: Thirteen Lives
Short Description: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

Title: The Wind Rises
Short Description: Jiro Horikoshi studies assiduously to fulfill his aim of becoming an aeronautical engineer. As WWII begins, fighter aircraft designed by him end up getting used by the Japanese Empire against its foes.

Title: Charade
Short Description: Romance and intrigue ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want to get their hands on a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. She soon loses trust in those who claim they want to help her.

Title: Deception
